page.title: 05 ROYAL DART YACHT CLUB
page.content:
The club was founded in 1881 It is situated on the banks of the River Dart between Kittery Court which is the oldest part of the village and the lower ferry. The yacht club provides boats, places to launch your boat and moorings.Most of the boats used at the club are:Gulls and Mirrors.The club organises races for the young members during the summer.One of the aspects of the club is to teach people to sail.You have to be eight years old to start sailing. Visitors to the club are able to use most of the facilities.
{Graham Wood James Reed
